subtests.name: Constructing a CSSScale with an angle CSSUnitValue for the coordinates throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSScale with a CSSMathValue that doesn't match <number> for the coordinates throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSScale with an invalid division by px/px for the coordinates throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.x to an angle CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.x to a CSSMathValue that doesn't match <number> throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.x to an invalid division by px/px throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.y to an angle CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.y to a CSSMathValue that doesn't match <number> throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.y to an invalid division by px/px throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.z to an angle CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.z to a CSSMathValue that doesn't match <number> throws a TypeError
Updating CSSScale.z to an invalid division by px/px throws a TypeError
CSSScale can be constructed from two number coordinates
CSSScale can be constructed from three number coordinates
CSSScale can be constructed from CSSMathValue coordinates
CSSScale.x can be updated to a number
CSSScale.x can be updated to a numberish
CSSScale.x can be updated to a CSSMathValue
CSSScale.y can be updated to a number
CSSScale.y can be updated to a numberish
CSSScale.y can be updated to a CSSMathValue
CSSScale.z can be updated to a number
CSSScale.z can be updated to a numberish
CSSScale.z can be updated to a CSSMathValue
Modifying CSSScale.is2D can be updated to true or false
